viewtier.ui
Class OrderedList

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--viewtier.ui.Component
        |
        +--viewtier.ui.OrderedList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class OrderedList
extends Component

Class List is a marked list of components. List can be ordered or unordered. Ordering type can be:

  • List.UNORDERED - list is unordered
  • List.ORDEREDUA - list items marked using uppercase alphanumeric characters
  • List.ORDEREDLA - list items marked using lowercase alphanumeric characters
  • List.ORDEREDUR - list items marked using uppercase roman numerals
  • List.ORDEREDLR - list items marked using lowercase roman numerals
  • List.ORDEREDAN - list items marked using arabic numbers

See Also:

getAttribute

public java.lang.Object getAttribute(java.lang.String featureName)
Description copied from class: Component
Returns value of component property whose API representation is not stabilized yet. Some components may override this method to provide acces to component-specific features. Returns null if feature is undefined.
Overrides:
getAttribute in class Component

getOrder

public int getOrder()
Returns ordering type of the list. Ordering type can be:
  • List.UNORDERED - list is unordered
  • List.ORDEREDUA - list items marked using uppercase alphanumeric characters
  • List.ORDEREDLA - list items marked using lowercase alphanumeric characters
  • List.ORDEREDUR - list items marked using uppercase roman numerals
  • List.ORDEREDLR - list items marked using lowercase roman numerals
  • List.ORDEREDAN - list items marked using arabic numbers
